markdown:
#### ADVISORY: Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible. ## Articles in this section - [What are the GCash Borrow Load fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476455413017-What-are-the-GCash-Borrow-Load-fees-I-need-to-know-about) - [I have a concern with GCash Borrow Load. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476345424153-I-have-a-concern-with-GCash-Borrow-Load-What-do-I-do) - [How can I repay my GCash Borrow Load?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476168459929-How-can-I-repay-my-GCash-Borrow-Load) - [What are the GCash Borrow Load promos available?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475956597017-What-are-the-GCash-Borrow-Load-promos-available) - [Can I borrow load on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475792516377-Can-I-borrow-load-on-GCash) - [I canceled my Borrow Load transaction but it still pushed through. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475592668441-I-canceled-my-Borrow-Load-transaction-but-it-still-pushed-through-What-do-I-do) - [GCash Borrow Load](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/8934604455065-GCash-Borrow-Load) ## Promoted articles - [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account) - [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification) - [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account) The GCash Borrow Load promos available are as follows: ### Globe | | | | | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | **Product** | **Inclusions** | **Validity** | **Repayment Date** | | GOEXTRA99 | 8GB data for all sites + Unli texts and calls to all networks | 7 Days | 14 days after promo availment | | GO+99 | Now with 5G and NEW discount vouchers! 
8GB of 5G for all sites **or** 8GB for your choice of apps | 7 Days | 14 days after promo availment | | Get this + 8GB for all sites, unli texts to all networks, and NEW discount vouchers | ### SMART | | | | | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | **Product** | **Inclusions** | **Validity** | **Repayment Date** | | NEW POWER ALL 99 | 8GB shareable data for all sites & apps + Unli TikTok every day + Unli Allnet texts for 7 days | 7 Days | 14 days after promo availment | | ALL DATA 99 | 6GB shareable data for all sites | 7 Days | 14 days after promo availment | To check the full list of available promos, open the Load icon on the GCash app and tap **Borrow**. Note: A PHP 10 processing fee will be charged on top of your [load convenience fees](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005872843-Load-Telco-Convenience-Fees) every time you borrow load. ### **Need more Help?** For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles: - [How can I repay my GCash Borrow Load?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476168459929) - [I have a concern with GCash Borrow Load. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476345424153) - [What are the GCash Borrow Load fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476455413017) [Previous](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476168459929-How-can-I-repay-my-GCash-Borrow-Load) How can I repay my GCash Borrow Load? [Next](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475792516377-Can-I-borrow-load-on-GCash) Can I borrow load on GCash? - [What are the GCash Borrow Load fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476455413017-What-are-the-GCash-Borrow-Load-fees-I-need-to-know-about) - [I have a concern with GCash Borrow Load. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476345424153-I-have-a-concern-with-GCash-Borrow-Load-What-do-I-do) - [How can I repay my GCash Borrow Load?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476168459929-How-can-I-repay-my-GCash-Borrow-Load) - [What are the GCash Borrow Load promos available?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475956597017-What-are-the-GCash-Borrow-Load-promos-available) - [Can I borrow load on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475792516377-Can-I-borrow-load-on-GCash) - [I canceled my Borrow Load transaction but it still pushed through. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475592668441-I-canceled-my-Borrow-Load-transaction-but-it-still-pushed-through-What-do-I-do) - [GCash Borrow Load](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/8934604455065-GCash-Borrow-Load) 40475956597017 Back to Top
